item.title: Conference and workshop papers
item.description: Susceptibility of Autonomous Driving Agents to Learning-Based Action-Space Attacks. Yuting Wu, Pengfei Zhou, Xin Lou, Rui Tan, Zbigniew Kalbarczyk, Ravishankar K. Iyer. The 9th International Workshop on Safety and Security Intelligent Vehicle (SSIV) with DSN'23, June 27, 2023, Porto, Portugal. PDF Effects of Learning-Based Action-Space Attacks on Autonomous Driving Agents. Yuting Wu, Xin Lou, Pengfei Zhou, Rui Tan, Zbigniew Kalbarczyk, Ravishankar K. Iyer. ICCPS Work-in-Progress session, May 9-12, 2023, San Antonio, Texas, USA.

item.title: Journal papers

IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing (TDSC). Special Issue on Reliability and Robustness in AI-Based Cybersecurity Solutions.
